name: Torch of Thexxis
description:
Bring the magic torch to the end of the dungeon! If you die another adventurer will follow in your footsteps! Short little solo project for the Weekly Game Jam #168

Arrow Keys to move, and Z + X for Primary and Secondary Attack

R to respawn at the start as another adventurer, the torch will be dropped before teleporting back to the start. There are 3 classes, Knights, Rangers, and Grenadiers. All start with only their primary weapon, but can pick up a secondary weapon from those before them.

Art assets are by GameKrazzy, you can find their work here:

https://gamekrazzy.itch.io/
